rules_text:
When Oxil enters, create a legendary 6/4 black and red Vampire Dragon creature token named Brix with flying and “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library, you may play it until the end of your next turn.”
[i]Battalion[/i] – Whenever Oxil and at least two other creatures attack, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, conquer that player. [i](Exile the top card of that players library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and spend mana as though it was any color to cast it.)[/i]
